group.description: Sweet breads: malt bread, currant bread
Other breads <8g/100g fat: bagel, chapatis (made without fat), milk bread, grilled papadums, pitta, rye bread, soda, flour tortillas, crumpets
Sugar coated breakfast cereals: sugar puffs, frosties
High sugar breakfast cereals: sugar content above 30g total sugar per 100g
Other breakfast cereals: muesli, bran flakes
Breakfast alternatives: nutrigrain bar, pop tart, breakfast cereal bars
Dehydrated convenience foods etc: supernoodles, pasta ‘n’ sauce, pot noodle, taste breaks
Tinned cereals: spaghetti in tomato sauce
Cereal based savouries: dumplings, yorkshire puddings
Sweet biscuits: excludes full coated biscuits
Savoury biscuits and baked goods eg crackers, oatcakes, water biscuits, cheddars, cheese/savoury scones
Cakes: sweet buns, sweet pastries, fruit scones and custard tart (sweet but not savoury based items)
Milk based sweet puddings: (excluding yoghurts and canned/stewed fruits) e.g. rice pudding, semolina, blancmange, custard, trifles
Skimmed milks: includes dried and longlife skimmed
Whole milks: includes longlife whole, dried whole & any soya or goats milk
Milkshakes: includes purchased & made from powder mix, made with all milk types
Cream: single, double whipping & sterilised canned cream (excludes artificial creams & toppings)
Lower fat cheese: cottage cheese, reduced fat, low fat cheese spreads
Cheese dishes: macaroni cheese, cheese sauce
Butter: includes half fat butter and other animal fats (e.g. lard)
Dairy fat spreads includes hard marg
Low fat spreads: includes very low fat spreads
Eggs: whole egg, white, yolk, dried, boiled, fried, scrambled, omelette, poached
Egg dishes: quiche, flan, scotch eggs
Fish in batter: all fried fish in batter
Fish dishes: curry, seafood pasta, fish pie
Non-potato snacks e.g. pretzels, tortilla crisps
Potato products e.g. wedges, waffles, croquettes
Peas: frozen, fresh, canned, dried & split
Other vegetables (excluding potato): carrots, green beans, pulses, cabbage, tomato base sauce, mushrooms, sweetcorn, stir fried vegetables, green salad
Vegetable dishes: vegetable curry, vegetable stew
Dressed salad dishes: potato salad, Greek salad, waldorf salad
Sweets (non-chocolate): toffee, boiled sweets, gums/jellies, mints, liquorice, raw jelly, popcorn
Ice cream, ice cream desserts and lollies
Chocolate: includes all plain, milk & white chocolate bars & coated bars e.g. caramels & wafers and full coated chocolate biscuits
Preserves and syrups: glace cherries, honey, jam, marmalade, lemon curd, marzipan, mincemeat, chocolate spread, ice cream topping
Diet carbonated drinks (includes low calorie drinks)
Fruit juices e.g. fresh orange juice
Fruit drink, ready to drink (sweetened)e.g. sunny delight, umbongo, five alive
Cordials & squashes: reduced sugar or low calorie squashes
Other cordials and squashes: excluding low calorie & reduced sugar
Other hot drinks water and milk based e.g. hot chocolate, ovaltine
Other sauces e.g. vinegar, salad cream, tartare sauce, cook-in-canned sauce
Other breads with >8g/100g fat: naan, chapatis (made with fat), fried papadums, croissants, fried bread
Cereal based savouries with vegetable or meat additions: bhajis, samosas, pakora, prawn toasts, spring rolls, meat filled spring roll
Non milk based sweet puddings: (excluding yoghurts and canned/stewed fruits) e.g. meringue, cheesecake, gateaux, jelly, fruit pies (pastry), crumble
Non meat containing savoury pies and pastries
Reduced fat/ calorie dressings and accompaniments: reduced fat: mayonnaise, salad cream, French dressing
